unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Snack Time
question_text: Sonia did a survey for her Statistics class about students' favorite snack foods.  She offered $5$ choices and tallied her results from $200$ questionnaires: $s$ chips pretzels cookies veggies nuts $p(s)$ $0.18$ $0.12$ $ 0.42$ $0.13$ $0.15$ Find the probability of the complement of a student choosing veggies or nut.
